column3: The proprietor is very friendly and tries hard to make his guests welcome. He will make breakfast the way you want it. The building is tastefully furnished.  It is an easy walk to the Gran' Place and many the central station.
Spacious and clean room.  Delicious breakfast.  Excellent restaurant recommendations.
Bathtub, breakfast, location and, of course, host were just ideal

There was nothing I didn't like about this property.  From the minute we walked in we knew we had struck gold.  The rooms were amazing, the home cooked croissants and eggs at breakfast were amazing and Mario was an amazing host.
Exceptional service, with attention to every little detail - breakfast, design, cleanliness and more.

Everything.  There is not a fault in this magnificent B&B.  The rooms are spacious, most comfortable and super clean.  The breakfast is amazing and served in a pleasant dining room.  Mario is an exceptional host.  He is very welcoming and helpful in suggesting nice restaurants and places to visit.  We cannot wait to go back.
